data.name: Archery Land
data.description:
You became a warrior who was called by the goddess to protect the shrine of water. 
As evening approaches, monsters aiming for the Shrine of Water appear.

Warrior! 

Pass 6 ordeals to protect the shrine of water from monsters.  And become a legendary warrior who protects the shrine of water and protects the goddess by killing monsters! 

Also, Be the greatest warrior in a breathtaking 1v1 battle with other warriors in the arena of Archery Land.

changelog.change_log:
Hello, everyone.
This is the Archery Land Team.

Please check out updates for Ver 0.6 on Friday, 16 September 2022

Important features
    1. Some changes for the tutorial
          - The shark will jump out when hitting the target in the tutorial! 

    2. Some changes for the temple.
          - The temple door is closed
          - The 2 pictures of the game story will be shown on the temple's door.
          - Added a function of 'touch the Shark Statue' to activate the temple. 

  3. Updates for the vibration when shooting the bow.
          - Added vibration when calling the bow.
          - Added vibration when shooting the bow.
          - Updated for vibration when pulling the bow.

Good Luck,
Archery Land, Archers! 

Thank you
Looksten

Hello, everyone. 
This is Archery Land.

Introduction to the application on 8 September 2022 (Thursday) new content for Ver 0.51.

Important features
    1. Single game balance has been fixed.
          -  Single-player games tier scores has been lowered. (Except Boss)
          -  'Trap' and 'Flight' have been corrected.
                          „Üç  Changed the appearance method of 'Timer Target'
Visual
    1. The design & interaction of the language selection button has been changed.

We hope you enjoy 'Archery Land' while shooting a bow!

thank you
Looksten
